original_text: And whatsoever is first ripe in the land, which they shall bring unto the Lord, shall be thine; every one that is clean in thine house shall eat of it.
korean_text: 그들이 여호와께 드리는 그 땅의 처음 익은 모든 열매는 네 것이니 네 집에서 정결한 자마다 먹을 것이라

sentences.original_text: And whatsoever is first ripe in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 땅에서 처음 익은 모든 것은

sentences.original_text: which they shall bring unto the Lord
every one that is clean in thine house
